top_note:
PRE-MITIGATION CONTENT REMOVAL ONLY
- This estimate is strictly for the packaging and temporary relocation of contents to allow for mitigation work to begin.
- Contents temporarily relocated for mitigation/restoration access
- All items will remain on-property in two designated staging areas as requested."
bottom_note:
"NO UNPACKING OR RESET SERVICES INCLUDED
- This scope does NOT include moving contents back unpacking
- Post-restoration content return requires separate estimate
- A new, separate estimate is required for any services needed after restoration work is complete."
